View.SQL: select "AREA"."ID", "AREA"."CODE", "CATEGORYTRANSLATION"."NAME" AS GEOGRAPHY, "AREATRANSLATION"."NAME" from "APP"."AREA" as "AREA", "APP"."AREATRANSLATION" as "AREATRANSLATION", "APP"."CATEGORYTRANSLATION" as "CATEGORYTRANSLATION" WHERE "AREATRANSLATION"."LOCALE" = '@@LOCALE@@' AND "AREATRANSLATION"."PARENT_ID" = "AREA"."ID" AND "CATEGORYTRANSLATION"."LOCALE" ='@@LOCALE@@' AND "CATEGORYTRANSLATION"."PARENT_ID" = "AREA"."GEOGRAPHYCATEGORY_ID" AND "AREA"."AREA_TYPE" = 'Country'

select "AREA"."ID", "AREA"."INCOMEGROUP_ID", "CATEGORYTRANSLATION"."NAME" from "APP"."AREA" as "AREA", "APP"."CATEGORYTRANSLATION" as "CATEGORYTRANSLATION" WHERE "CATEGORYTRANSLATION"."LOCALE" ='@@LOCALE@@' AND "CATEGORYTRANSLATION"."PARENT_ID" = "AREA"."INCOMEGROUP_ID" AND "AREA"."AREA_TYPE" = 'Country'

select "ORGANIZATION"."ID", "ORGANIZATION"."CODE", "ORGANIZATION"."ACRONYM", "ORGANIZATIONTRANSLATION"."NAME" from "APP"."ORGANIZATION" as "ORGANIZATION", "APP"."ORGANIZATIONTRANSLATION" as "ORGANIZATIONTRANSLATION" WHERE "ORGANIZATIONTRANSLATION"."LOCALE" ='@@LOCALE@@' AND "ORGANIZATIONTRANSLATION"."PARENT_ID" = "ORGANIZATION"."ID"

select "ORGANIZATION"."ID", "ORGANIZATIONTRANSLATION"."NAME", "ORGANIZATION"."ACRONYM" from "APP"."ORGANIZATION" as "ORGANIZATION", "APP"."ORGANIZATIONTRANSLATION" as "ORGANIZATIONTRANSLATION" WHERE "ORGANIZATIONTRANSLATION"."LOCALE" ='@@LOCALE@@' AND "ORGANIZATIONTRANSLATION"."PARENT_ID" = "ORGANIZATION"."ID" AND "ORGANIZATIONTRANSLATION"."DONORNAME" = '@@COUNTRY_NAME@@' ORDER BY "ORGANIZATIONTRANSLATION"."NAME"

select DISTINCT "CATEGORY"."ID", "CATEGORY"."CODE", "CATEGORYTRANSLATION"."NAME" from "APP"."CATEGORY" as "CATEGORY", "APP"."CATEGORYTRANSLATION" as "CATEGORYTRANSLATION", "APP"."CATEGORY_TAGS" as "CATEGORY_TAGS" WHERE "CATEGORYTRANSLATION"."LOCALE" ='@@LOCALE@@' AND "CATEGORYTRANSLATION"."PARENT_ID" = "CATEGORY"."ID" AND "CATEGORY_TAGS"."CATEGORY_ID" = "CATEGORY"."ID" AND "CATEGORY_TAGS"."TAGS_ID" = (SELECT ID FROM "APP"."CATEGORY" WHERE "CODE"='CHANNEL_TAG')

select "CATEGORY"."ID", "CATEGORYTRANSLATION"."NAME", "CATEGORY"."CODE" from "APP"."CATEGORY" as "CATEGORY", "APP"."CATEGORYTRANSLATION" as "CATEGORYTRANSLATION", "APP"."CATEGORY_TAGS" as "CATEGORY_TAGS" WHERE "CATEGORYTRANSLATION"."LOCALE" ='@@LOCALE@@' AND "CATEGORYTRANSLATION"."PARENT_ID" = "CATEGORY"."ID" AND "CATEGORY_TAGS"."CATEGORY_ID" = "CATEGORY"."ID" AND "CATEGORY_TAGS"."TAGS_ID" = (SELECT ID FROM "APP"."CATEGORY" WHERE "CODE"='CHANNEL_TAG')

select "CATEGORY"."ID", "CATEGORYTRANSLATION"."NAME", "CATEGORY"."CODE" from "APP"."CATEGORY" as "CATEGORY", "APP"."CATEGORYTRANSLATION" as "CATEGORYTRANSLATION", "APP"."CATEGORY_TAGS" as "CATEGORY_TAGS" WHERE "CATEGORYTRANSLATION"."LOCALE" ='@@LOCALE@@' AND "CATEGORYTRANSLATION"."PARENT_ID" = "CATEGORY"."ID" AND "CATEGORY_TAGS"."CATEGORY_ID" = "CATEGORY"."ID" AND "CATEGORY_TAGS"."TAGS_ID" = (SELECT ID FROM "APP"."CATEGORY" WHERE "CODE"='ALL_TYPE_OF_AID_TAG')

select "CATEGORY"."ID", "CATEGORYTRANSLATION"."NAME", "CATEGORY"."CODE" from "APP"."CATEGORY" as "CATEGORY", "APP"."CATEGORYTRANSLATION" as "CATEGORYTRANSLATION", "APP"."CATEGORY_TAGS" as "CATEGORY_TAGS" WHERE "CATEGORYTRANSLATION"."LOCALE" ='@@LOCALE@@' AND "CATEGORYTRANSLATION"."PARENT_ID" = "CATEGORY"."ID" AND "CATEGORY_TAGS"."CATEGORY_ID" = "CATEGORY"."ID" AND "CATEGORY_TAGS"."TAGS_ID" = (SELECT ID FROM "APP"."CATEGORY" WHERE "CODE"='TYPE_OF_FLOW_TAG')

select "CATEGORY"."ID", "CATEGORYTRANSLATION"."NAME", "CATEGORY"."CODE" from "APP"."CATEGORY" as "CATEGORY", "APP"."CATEGORYTRANSLATION" as "CATEGORYTRANSLATION", "APP"."CATEGORY_TAGS" as "CATEGORY_TAGS" WHERE "CATEGORYTRANSLATION"."LOCALE" ='@@LOCALE@@' AND "CATEGORYTRANSLATION"."PARENT_ID" = "CATEGORY"."ID" AND "CATEGORY_TAGS"."CATEGORY_ID" = "CATEGORY"."ID" AND "CATEGORY_TAGS"."TAGS_ID" = (SELECT ID FROM "APP"."CATEGORY" WHERE "CODE"='ALL_TYPE_OF_FINANCE_TAG')

select "CATEGORY"."ID", "CATEGORYTRANSLATION"."NAME", "CATEGORY"."CODE" from "APP"."CATEGORY" as "CATEGORY", "APP"."CATEGORYTRANSLATION" as "CATEGORYTRANSLATION", "APP"."CATEGORY_TAGS" as "CATEGORY_TAGS" WHERE "CATEGORYTRANSLATION"."LOCALE" ='@@LOCALE@@' AND "CATEGORYTRANSLATION"."PARENT_ID" = "CATEGORY"."ID" AND "CATEGORY_TAGS"."CATEGORY_ID" = "CATEGORY"."ID" AND "CATEGORY_TAGS"."TAGS_ID" = (SELECT ID FROM "APP"."CATEGORY" WHERE "CODE"='TYPE_OF_FINANCE_TAG')

select "CATEGORY"."ID", "CATEGORYTRANSLATION"."NAME", "CATEGORY"."CODE" from "APP"."CATEGORY" as "CATEGORY", "APP"."CATEGORYTRANSLATION" as "CATEGORYTRANSLATION", "APP"."CATEGORY_TAGS" as "CATEGORY_TAGS" WHERE "CATEGORYTRANSLATION"."LOCALE" ='@@LOCALE@@' AND "CATEGORYTRANSLATION"."PARENT_ID" = "CATEGORY"."ID" AND "CATEGORY_TAGS"."CATEGORY_ID" = "CATEGORY"."ID" AND "CATEGORY_TAGS"."TAGS_ID" = (SELECT ID FROM "APP"."CATEGORY" WHERE "CODE"='ALL_SECTOR_TAG')

select id, CASE WHEN lower(ancestorname) like 'root%' or ancestorname IS NULL THEN parentname ELSE ancestorname END as ancestorname, name from (select id, name, ANCESTORID, CASE WHEN lower(parentname) like 'root%' THEN name ELSE parentname END as parentname, (select cattrn.name from CATEGORYTRANSLATION cattrn WHERE cattrn.locale = '@@LOCALE@@' AND cattrn.parent_id = ANCESTORID) as ANCESTORNAME from (select "CATEGORY"."ID", "CATEGORY"."PARENTCATEGORY_ID", (select cat.parentcategory_id from CATEGORY cat where cat.id = "CATEGORY".PARENTCATEGORY_ID) as ANCESTORID, (select cattrn.name from CATEGORYTRANSLATION cattrn WHERE cattrn.locale = '@@LOCALE@@' AND cattrn.parent_id = "CATEGORY".PARENTCATEGORY_ID) as PARENTNAME, "CATEGORYTRANSLATION"."NAME" from "APP"."CATEGORY" as "CATEGORY", "APP"."CATEGORYTRANSLATION" as "CATEGORYTRANSLATION", "APP"."CATEGORY_TAGS" as "CATEGORY_TAGS" WHERE "CATEGORYTRANSLATION"."LOCALE" ='@@LOCALE@@' AND "CATEGORYTRANSLATION"."PARENT_ID" = "CATEGORY"."ID" AND "CATEGORY_TAGS"."CATEGORY_ID" = "CATEGORY"."ID" AND "CATEGORY_TAGS"."TAGS_ID" = (SELECT ID FROM "APP"."CATEGORY" WHERE "CODE"='ALL_SECTOR_TAG')) as parentsectors) as ancestorsectors

select "CATEGORY"."ID", "CATEGORYTRANSLATION"."NAME", "CATEGORY"."CODE" from "APP"."CATEGORY" as "CATEGORY", "APP"."CATEGORYTRANSLATION" as "CATEGORYTRANSLATION", "APP"."CATEGORY_TAGS" as "CATEGORY_TAGS" WHERE "CATEGORYTRANSLATION"."LOCALE" ='@@LOCALE@@' AND "CATEGORYTRANSLATION"."PARENT_ID" = "CATEGORY"."ID" AND "CATEGORY_TAGS"."CATEGORY_ID" = "CATEGORY"."ID" AND "CATEGORY_TAGS"."TAGS_ID" = (SELECT ID FROM "APP"."CATEGORY" WHERE "CODE"='BI_MULTILATERAL_TAG')

select "TX"."ID", CASE WHEN "TXTRANSLATION"."SHORTDESCRIPTION" IS NOT NULL THEN "TXTRANSLATION"."SHORTDESCRIPTION" ELSE "TXTRANSLATION_EN"."SHORTDESCRIPTION" END AS TITLE FROM "APP"."FINANCIALTRANSACTION" AS "TX" LEFT JOIN "APP"."FINANCIALTRANSACTIONTRANSLATION" "TXTRANSLATION" ON "TXTRANSLATION"."LOCALE" ='@@LOCALE@@' AND "TXTRANSLATION"."PARENT_ID" = "TX"."ID" LEFT JOIN "APP"."FINANCIALTRANSACTIONTRANSLATION" "TXTRANSLATION_EN" ON "TXTRANSLATION_EN"."LOCALE" ='en' AND "TXTRANSLATION_EN"."PARENT_ID" = "TX"."ID" WHERE "TXTRANSLATION"."SHORTDESCRIPTION" IS NOT NULL OR "TXTRANSLATION_EN"."SHORTDESCRIPTION" IS NOT NULL

View.name: FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW
View.SQL: select cat.coefficient, CASE WHEN cat.coefficient IS NULL THEN AMOUNTS_EXTENDED_AMOUNT ELSE (AMOUNTS_EXTENDED_AMOUNT * cat.COEFFICIENT) / 100 END as AMOUNTS_EXTENDED_AMOUNT_WITH_COEFFICIENT, CASE WHEN cat.coefficient IS NULL THEN AMOUNTS_RECEIVED_AMOUNT ELSE (AMOUNTS_RECEIVED_AMOUNT * cat.COEFFICIENT) / 100 END as AMOUNTS_RECEIVED_AMOUNT_WITH_COEFFICIENT, CASE WHEN cat.coefficient IS NULL THEN COMMITMENT_AMOUNT ELSE (COMMITMENT_AMOUNT * cat.COEFFICIENT) / 100 END as COMMITMENT_AMOUNT_WITH_COEFFICIENT, CASE WHEN (cat.coefficient IS NULL AND FT.COMMITMENT_AMOUNT < 0) THEN COMMITMENT_AMOUNT ELSE (COMMITMENT_AMOUNT * cat.COEFFICIENT) / 100 END as NEGATIVE_COMMITMENT_AMOUNT_WITH_COEFFICIENT, CASE WHEN (cat.coefficient IS NULL AND FT.COMMITMENT_AMOUNT < 0) THEN AMOUNTS_RECEIVED_AMOUNT ELSE (AMOUNTS_RECEIVED_AMOUNT * cat.COEFFICIENT) / 100 END as NEGATIVE_AMOUNTS_RECEIVED_AMOUNT_WITH_COEFFICIENT, CASE WHEN cat.coefficient IS NULL THEN AMOUNTS_EXP_COMMIT_AMOUNT ELSE (AMOUNTS_EXP_COMMIT_AMOUNT * cat.COEFFICIENT) / 100 END as AMOUNTS_EXP_COMMIT_AMOUNT_WITH_COEFFICIENT, CASE WHEN cat.coefficient IS NULL THEN AMOUNTS_EXP_EXTENDED_AMOUNT ELSE (AMOUNTS_EXP_EXTENDED_AMOUNT * cat.COEFFICIENT) / 100 END as AMOUNTS_EXP_EXTENDED_AMOUNT_WITH_COEFFICIENT, CASE WHEN cat.coefficient IS NULL THEN AMOUNTS_INTEREST_RECEIVED_AMOUNT ELSE (AMOUNTS_INTEREST_RECEIVED_AMOUNT * cat.COEFFICIENT) / 100 END as AMOUNTS_INTEREST_RECEIVED_AMOUNT_WITH_COEFFICIENT, ft.* from FINANCIALTRANSACTION ft left join CATEGORY cat ON cat.id = ft.channel_id WHERE (ft.draft = false and ft.approved = true) OR draft IS NULL

KeyExpression.SQL: (CASE WHEN INVESTMENT = TRUE THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END)
(CASE WHEN PROGRAMMEBASEDAPPROACH = TRUE THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END)
(CASE WHEN FREESTANDINGTECHNICALCOOPERATION = TRUE THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END)
CASE WHEN CPA IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE CASE WHEN CPA = FALSE THEN 0 ELSE 1 END END
CASE WHEN projectCoFinanced IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE CASE WHEN projectCoFinanced = FALSE THEN 0 ELSE 1 END END

MeasureExpression.SQL: (1 / (SELECT AVG(RATE) FROM HISTORICALEXCHANGERATE WHERE (SOURCE = 'OECD' OR SOURCE='National') AND BASE_CURRENCY = "FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."AMOUNTS_EXTENDED_CURR" AND BASE_CURRENCY = '@@COUNTRY_CURRENCY@@' AND COUNTER_CURRENCY = '@@CURRENCY@@' AND "FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."DRAFT" IS NOT NULL AND YEAR(DATE) = YEAR("FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."REPORTINGYEAR")))
CASE WHEN DRAFT IS NULL THEN AMOUNTS_EXTENDED_AMOUNT ELSE NULL END
CASE WHEN DRAFT IS NOT NULL THEN AMOUNTS_EXTENDED_AMOUNT_WITH_COEFFICIENT ELSE NULL END

CASE WHEN "FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."COMMITMENT_CURR" = '@@CURRENCY@@' THEN (AMOUNTS_EXTENDED_AMOUNT_WITH_COEFFICIENT) ELSE (AMOUNTS_EXTENDED_AMOUNT_WITH_COEFFICIENT * Cast((SELECT AVG(RATE) FROM HISTORICALEXCHANGERATE WHERE (SOURCE = 'OECD' OR SOURCE='National') AND BASE_CURRENCY = "FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."AMOUNTS_EXTENDED_CURR" AND "FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."DRAFT" IS NOT NULL AND COUNTER_CURRENCY = '@@CURRENCY@@' AND YEAR(DATE) = YEAR("FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."REPORTINGYEAR")) as decimal(16, 8))) END

CASE WHEN "FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."COMMITMENT_CURR" = '@@CURRENCY@@' THEN (AMOUNTS_EXTENDED_AMOUNT_WITH_COEFFICIENT) ELSE (AMOUNTS_EXTENDED_AMOUNT_WITH_COEFFICIENT * Cast((SELECT AVG(RATE) FROM HISTORICALEXCHANGERATE WHERE SOURCE = 'Internet' AND BASE_CURRENCY = "FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."AMOUNTS_EXTENDED_CURR" AND "FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."DRAFT" IS NOT NULL AND COUNTER_CURRENCY = '@@CURRENCY@@' AND YEAR(DATE) = YEAR("FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."REPORTINGYEAR")) as decimal(16, 8))) END

CASE WHEN "FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."COMMITMENT_CURR" = '@@CURRENCY@@' THEN (AMOUNTS_RECEIVED_AMOUNT_WITH_COEFFICIENT) ELSE (AMOUNTS_RECEIVED_AMOUNT_WITH_COEFFICIENT * Cast((SELECT AVG(RATE) FROM HISTORICALEXCHANGERATE WHERE (SOURCE = 'OECD' OR SOURCE='National') AND BASE_CURRENCY = "FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."AMOUNTS_RECEIVED_CURR" AND COUNTER_CURRENCY = '@@CURRENCY@@' AND YEAR(DATE) = YEAR("FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."REPORTINGYEAR")) as decimal(16, 8))) END

CASE WHEN "FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."COMMITMENT_CURR" = '@@CURRENCY@@' THEN (AMOUNTS_RECEIVED_AMOUNT_WITH_COEFFICIENT) ELSE (AMOUNTS_RECEIVED_AMOUNT_WITH_COEFFICIENT * Cast((SELECT AVG(RATE) FROM HISTORICALEXCHANGERATE WHERE SOURCE = 'Internet' AND BASE_CURRENCY = "FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."AMOUNTS_RECEIVED_CURR" AND COUNTER_CURRENCY = '@@CURRENCY@@' AND YEAR(DATE) = YEAR("FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."REPORTINGYEAR")) as decimal(16, 8))) END

CASE WHEN "FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."COMMITMENT_CURR" = '@@CURRENCY@@' THEN (COMMITMENT_AMOUNT_WITH_COEFFICIENT) ELSE (COMMITMENT_AMOUNT_WITH_COEFFICIENT * Cast((SELECT AVG(RATE) FROM HISTORICALEXCHANGERATE WHERE (SOURCE = 'OECD' OR SOURCE='National') AND BASE_CURRENCY = "FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."COMMITMENT_CURR" AND COUNTER_CURRENCY = '@@CURRENCY@@' AND YEAR(DATE) = YEAR("FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."REPORTINGYEAR")) as decimal(16, 8))) END

CASE WHEN "FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."COMMITMENT_CURR" = '@@CURRENCY@@' THEN (COMMITMENT_AMOUNT_WITH_COEFFICIENT) ELSE (COMMITMENT_AMOUNT_WITH_COEFFICIENT * Cast((SELECT AVG(RATE) FROM HISTORICALEXCHANGERATE WHERE SOURCE = 'Internet' AND BASE_CURRENCY = "FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."COMMITMENT_CURR" AND COUNTER_CURRENCY = '@@CURRENCY@@' AND YEAR(DATE) = YEAR("FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."REPORTINGYEAR")) as decimal(16, 8))) END

CASE WHEN "FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."COMMITMENT_CURR" = '@@CURRENCY@@' THEN (AMOUNTS_INTEREST_RECEIVED_AMOUNT_WITH_COEFFICIENT) ELSE (AMOUNTS_INTEREST_RECEIVED_AMOUNT_WITH_COEFFICIENT * Cast((SELECT AVG(RATE) FROM HISTORICALEXCHANGERATE WHERE (SOURCE = 'OECD' OR SOURCE='National') AND BASE_CURRENCY = "FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."AMOUNTS_INTEREST_RECEIVED_CURR" AND COUNTER_CURRENCY = '@@CURRENCY@@' AND YEAR(DATE) = YEAR("FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."REPORTINGYEAR")) as decimal(16, 8))) END

CASE WHEN "FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."COMMITMENT_CURR" = '@@CURRENCY@@' THEN (AMOUNTS_INTEREST_RECEIVED_AMOUNT_WITH_COEFFICIENT) ELSE (AMOUNTS_INTEREST_RECEIVED_AMOUNT_WITH_COEFFICIENT * Cast((SELECT AVG(RATE) FROM HISTORICALEXCHANGERATE WHERE SOURCE = 'Internet' AND BASE_CURRENCY = "FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."AMOUNTS_INTEREST_RECEIVED_CURR" AND COUNTER_CURRENCY = '@@CURRENCY@@' AND YEAR(DATE) = YEAR("FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."REPORTINGYEAR")) as decimal(16, 8))) END

CASE WHEN "FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."COMMITMENT_CURR" = '@@CURRENCY@@' THEN (AMOUNTS_EXP_COMMIT_AMOUNT_WITH_COEFFICIENT) ELSE (AMOUNTS_EXP_COMMIT_AMOUNT_WITH_COEFFICIENT * Cast((SELECT AVG(RATE) FROM HISTORICALEXCHANGERATE WHERE (SOURCE = 'OECD' OR SOURCE='National') AND BASE_CURRENCY = "FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."AMOUNTS_EXP_COMMIT_CURR" AND COUNTER_CURRENCY = '@@CURRENCY@@' AND YEAR(DATE) = YEAR("FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."REPORTINGYEAR")) as decimal(16, 8))) END

CASE WHEN "FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."COMMITMENT_CURR" = '@@CURRENCY@@' THEN (AMOUNTS_EXP_COMMIT_AMOUNT_WITH_COEFFICIENT) ELSE (AMOUNTS_EXP_COMMIT_AMOUNT_WITH_COEFFICIENT * Cast((SELECT AVG(RATE) FROM HISTORICALEXCHANGERATE WHERE SOURCE = 'Internet' AND BASE_CURRENCY = "FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."AMOUNTS_EXP_COMMIT_CURR" AND COUNTER_CURRENCY = '@@CURRENCY@@' AND YEAR(DATE) = YEAR("FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."REPORTINGYEAR")) as decimal(16, 8))) END

CASE WHEN "FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."COMMITMENT_CURR" = '@@CURRENCY@@' THEN (AMOUNTS_EXP_EXTENDED_AMOUNT_WITH_COEFFICIENT) ELSE (AMOUNTS_EXP_EXTENDED_AMOUNT_WITH_COEFFICIENT * Cast((SELECT AVG(RATE) FROM HISTORICALEXCHANGERATE WHERE (SOURCE = 'OECD' OR SOURCE='National') AND BASE_CURRENCY = "FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."AMOUNTS_EXP_EXTENDED_CURR" AND COUNTER_CURRENCY = '@@CURRENCY@@' AND YEAR(DATE) = YEAR("FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."REPORTINGYEAR")) as decimal(16, 8))) END

CASE WHEN "FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."COMMITMENT_CURR" = '@@CURRENCY@@' THEN (AMOUNTS_EXP_EXTENDED_AMOUNT_WITH_COEFFICIENT) ELSE (AMOUNTS_EXP_EXTENDED_AMOUNT_WITH_COEFFICIENT * Cast((SELECT AVG(RATE) FROM HISTORICALEXCHANGERATE WHERE SOURCE = 'Internet' AND BASE_CURRENCY = "FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."AMOUNTS_EXP_EXTENDED_CURR" AND COUNTER_CURRENCY = '@@CURRENCY@@' AND YEAR(DATE) = YEAR("FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."REPORTINGYEAR")) as decimal(16, 8))) END

CASE WHEN "FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."COMMITMENT_CURR" = '@@CURRENCY@@' THEN (NEGATIVE_COMMITMENT_AMOUNT_WITH_COEFFICIENT) ELSE (NEGATIVE_COMMITMENT_AMOUNT_WITH_COEFFICIENT * Cast((SELECT AVG(RATE) FROM HISTORICALEXCHANGERATE WHERE (SOURCE = 'OECD' OR SOURCE='National') AND BASE_CURRENCY = "FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."COMMITMENT_CURR" AND COUNTER_CURRENCY = '@@CURRENCY@@' AND YEAR(DATE) = YEAR("FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."REPORTINGYEAR")) as decimal(16, 8))) END

CASE WHEN "FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."COMMITMENT_CURR" = '@@CURRENCY@@' THEN (NEGATIVE_AMOUNTS_RECEIVED_AMOUNT_WITH_COEFFICIENT) ELSE (NEGATIVE_AMOUNTS_RECEIVED_AMOUNT_WITH_COEFFICIENT * Cast((SELECT AVG(RATE) FROM HISTORICALEXCHANGERATE WHERE (SOURCE = 'OECD' OR SOURCE='National') AND BASE_CURRENCY = "FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."COMMITMENT_CURR" AND COUNTER_CURRENCY = '@@CURRENCY@@' AND YEAR(DATE) = YEAR("FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."REPORTINGYEAR")) as decimal(16, 8))) END

CASE WHEN "FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."COMMITMENT_CURR" = '@@CURRENCY@@' THEN (BUDGET_MTEF_DISB_AMOUNT) ELSE (BUDGET_MTEF_DISB_AMOUNT * Cast((SELECT AVG(RATE) FROM HISTORICALEXCHANGERATE WHERE (SOURCE = 'OECD' OR SOURCE='National') AND BASE_CURRENCY = "FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."BUDGET_MTEF_DISB_CURR" AND COUNTER_CURRENCY = '@@CURRENCY@@' AND YEAR(DATE) = YEAR("FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."REPORTINGYEAR")) as decimal(16, 8))) END

CASE WHEN "FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."COMMITMENT_CURR" = '@@CURRENCY@@' THEN (BUDGET_MTEF_DISB_AMOUNT) ELSE (BUDGET_MTEF_DISB_AMOUNT * Cast((SELECT AVG(RATE) FROM HISTORICALEXCHANGERATE WHERE SOURCE = 'Internet' AND BASE_CURRENCY = "FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."BUDGET_MTEF_DISB_CURR" AND COUNTER_CURRENCY = '@@CURRENCY@@' AND YEAR(DATE) = YEAR("FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."REPORTINGYEAR")) as decimal(16, 8))) END

CASE WHEN "FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."COMMITMENT_CURR" = '@@CURRENCY@@' THEN (BUDGET_MTEF_DISB_P1_AMOUNT) ELSE (BUDGET_MTEF_DISB_P1_AMOUNT * Cast((SELECT AVG(RATE) FROM HISTORICALEXCHANGERATE WHERE (SOURCE = 'OECD' OR SOURCE='National') AND BASE_CURRENCY = "FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."BUDGET_MTEF_DISB_P1_CURR" AND COUNTER_CURRENCY = '@@CURRENCY@@' AND YEAR(DATE) = YEAR("FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."REPORTINGYEAR")) as decimal(16, 8))) END

CASE WHEN "FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."COMMITMENT_CURR" = '@@CURRENCY@@' THEN (BUDGET_MTEF_DISB_P1_AMOUNT) ELSE (BUDGET_MTEF_DISB_P1_AMOUNT * Cast((SELECT AVG(RATE) FROM HISTORICALEXCHANGERATE WHERE SOURCE = 'Internet' AND BASE_CURRENCY = "FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."BUDGET_MTEF_DISB_P1_CURR" AND COUNTER_CURRENCY = '@@CURRENCY@@' AND YEAR(DATE) = YEAR("FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."REPORTINGYEAR")) as decimal(16, 8))) END

CASE WHEN "FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."COMMITMENT_CURR" = '@@CURRENCY@@' THEN (BUDGET_MTEF_DISB_P2_AMOUNT) ELSE (BUDGET_MTEF_DISB_P2_AMOUNT * Cast((SELECT AVG(RATE) FROM HISTORICALEXCHANGERATE WHERE (SOURCE = 'OECD' OR SOURCE='National') AND BASE_CURRENCY = "FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."BUDGET_MTEF_DISB_P2_CURR" AND COUNTER_CURRENCY = '@@CURRENCY@@' AND YEAR(DATE) = YEAR("FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."REPORTINGYEAR")) as decimal(16, 8))) END

CASE WHEN "FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."COMMITMENT_CURR" = '@@CURRENCY@@' THEN (BUDGET_MTEF_DISB_P2_AMOUNT) ELSE (BUDGET_MTEF_DISB_P2_AMOUNT * Cast((SELECT AVG(RATE) FROM HISTORICALEXCHANGERATE WHERE SOURCE = 'Internet' AND BASE_CURRENCY = "FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."BUDGET_MTEF_DISB_P2_CURR" AND COUNTER_CURRENCY = '@@CURRENCY@@' AND YEAR(DATE) = YEAR("FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."REPORTINGYEAR")) as decimal(16, 8))) END

CASE WHEN "FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."COMMITMENT_CURR" = '@@CURRENCY@@' THEN (BUDGET_MTEF_DISB_P3_AMOUNT) ELSE (BUDGET_MTEF_DISB_P3_AMOUNT * Cast((SELECT AVG(RATE) FROM HISTORICALEXCHANGERATE WHERE (SOURCE = 'OECD' OR SOURCE='National') AND BASE_CURRENCY = "FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."BUDGET_MTEF_DISB_P3_CURR" AND COUNTER_CURRENCY = '@@CURRENCY@@' AND YEAR(DATE) = YEAR("FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."REPORTINGYEAR")) as decimal(16, 8))) END

CASE WHEN "FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."COMMITMENT_CURR" = '@@CURRENCY@@' THEN (BUDGET_MTEF_DISB_P3_AMOUNT) ELSE (BUDGET_MTEF_DISB_P3_AMOUNT * Cast((SELECT AVG(RATE) FROM HISTORICALEXCHANGERATE WHERE SOURCE = 'Internet' AND BASE_CURRENCY = "FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."BUDGET_MTEF_DISB_P3_CURR" AND COUNTER_CURRENCY = '@@CURRENCY@@' AND YEAR(DATE) = YEAR("FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."REPORTINGYEAR")) as decimal(16, 8))) END

CASE WHEN "FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."COMMITMENT_CURR" = '@@CURRENCY@@' THEN (BUDGET_MTEF_DISB_P4_AMOUNT) ELSE (BUDGET_MTEF_DISB_P4_AMOUNT * Cast((SELECT AVG(RATE) FROM HISTORICALEXCHANGERATE WHERE (SOURCE = 'OECD' OR SOURCE='National') AND BASE_CURRENCY = "FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."BUDGET_MTEF_DISB_P4_CURR" AND COUNTER_CURRENCY = '@@CURRENCY@@' AND YEAR(DATE) = YEAR("FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."REPORTINGYEAR")) as decimal(16, 8))) END

CASE WHEN "FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."COMMITMENT_CURR" = '@@CURRENCY@@' THEN (BUDGET_MTEF_DISB_P4_AMOUNT) ELSE (BUDGET_MTEF_DISB_P4_AMOUNT * Cast((SELECT AVG(RATE) FROM HISTORICALEXCHANGERATE WHERE SOURCE = 'Internet' AND BASE_CURRENCY = "FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."BUDGET_MTEF_DISB_P4_CURR" AND COUNTER_CURRENCY = '@@CURRENCY@@' AND YEAR(DATE) = YEAR("FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."REPORTINGYEAR")) as decimal(16, 8))) END

CASE WHEN "FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."COMMITMENT_CURR" = '@@CURRENCY@@' THEN (AMOUNTS_TIED_AMOUNT) ELSE (AMOUNTS_TIED_AMOUNT * Cast((SELECT AVG(RATE) FROM HISTORICALEXCHANGERATE WHERE (SOURCE = 'OECD' OR SOURCE='National') AND BASE_CURRENCY = "FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."AMOUNTS_TIED_CURR" AND COUNTER_CURRENCY = '@@CURRENCY@@' AND YEAR(DATE) = YEAR("FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."REPORTINGYEAR")) as decimal(16, 8))) END

CASE WHEN "FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."COMMITMENT_CURR" = '@@CURRENCY@@' THEN (AMOUNTS_TIED_AMOUNT) ELSE (AMOUNTS_TIED_AMOUNT * Cast((SELECT AVG(RATE) FROM HISTORICALEXCHANGERATE WHERE SOURCE = 'Internet' AND BASE_CURRENCY = "FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."AMOUNTS_TIED_CURR" AND COUNTER_CURRENCY = '@@CURRENCY@@' AND YEAR(DATE) = YEAR("FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."REPORTINGYEAR")) as decimal(16, 8))) END

CASE WHEN "FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."COMMITMENT_CURR" = '@@CURRENCY@@' THEN (AMOUNTS_UNTIED_AMOUNT) ELSE (AMOUNTS_UNTIED_AMOUNT * Cast((SELECT AVG(RATE) FROM HISTORICALEXCHANGERATE WHERE (SOURCE = 'OECD' OR SOURCE='National') AND BASE_CURRENCY = "FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."AMOUNTS_UNTIED_CURR" AND COUNTER_CURRENCY = '@@CURRENCY@@' AND YEAR(DATE) = YEAR("FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."REPORTINGYEAR")) as decimal(16, 8))) END

CASE WHEN "FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."COMMITMENT_CURR" = '@@CURRENCY@@' THEN (AMOUNTS_UNTIED_AMOUNT) ELSE (AMOUNTS_UNTIED_AMOUNT * Cast((SELECT AVG(RATE) FROM HISTORICALEXCHANGERATE WHERE SOURCE = 'Internet' AND BASE_CURRENCY = "FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."AMOUNTS_UNTIED_CURR" AND COUNTER_CURRENCY = '@@CURRENCY@@' AND YEAR(DATE) = YEAR("FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."REPORTINGYEAR")) as decimal(16, 8))) END

CASE WHEN "FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."COMMITMENT_CURR" = '@@CURRENCY@@' THEN (AMOUNTS_PARTIALLY_UNTIED_AMOUNT) ELSE (AMOUNTS_PARTIALLY_UNTIED_AMOUNT * Cast((SELECT AVG(RATE) FROM HISTORICALEXCHANGERATE WHERE (SOURCE = 'OECD' OR SOURCE='National') AND BASE_CURRENCY = "FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."AMOUNTS_PARTIALLY_UNTIED_CURR" AND COUNTER_CURRENCY = '@@CURRENCY@@' AND YEAR(DATE) = YEAR("FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."REPORTINGYEAR")) as decimal(16, 8))) END

CASE WHEN "FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."COMMITMENT_CURR" = '@@CURRENCY@@' THEN (AMOUNTS_PARTIALLY_UNTIED_AMOUNT) ELSE (AMOUNTS_PARTIALLY_UNTIED_AMOUNT * Cast((SELECT AVG(RATE) FROM HISTORICALEXCHANGERATE WHERE SOURCE = 'Internet' AND BASE_CURRENCY = "FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."AMOUNTS_PARTIALLY_UNTIED_CURR" AND COUNTER_CURRENCY = '@@CURRENCY@@' AND YEAR(DATE) = YEAR("FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."REPORTINGYEAR")) as decimal(16, 8))) END

CalculatedMember.name: Net Amount Currency NATLOECD
CalculatedMember.Formula: [Measures].[Extended Amount Currency NATLOECD] - [Measures].[Received Amount Currency NATLOECD]

CalculatedMember.name: Net Amount Currency INTERNET
CalculatedMember.Formula: [Measures].[Extended Amount Currency INTERNET] - [Measures].[Received Amount Currency INTERNET]

CalculatedMember.name: Extended Amount Currency NATLOECD or INTERNET
CalculatedMember.caption: %{extendedAmount}
CalculatedMember.Formula: IIF([Measures].[Extended Amount Currency NATLOECD] > 0, [Measures].[Extended Amount Currency NATLOECD], [Measures].[Extended Amount Currency INTERNET])

CalculatedMember.name: Received Amount Currency NATLOECD or INTERNET
CalculatedMember.caption: %{receivedAmount}
CalculatedMember.Formula: IIF([Measures].[Received Amount Currency NATLOECD] > 0, [Measures].[Extended Amount Currency NATLOECD], [Measures].[Received Amount Currency INTERNET])

CalculatedMember.name: Net Amount Currency NATLOECD or INTERNET
CalculatedMember.caption: %{netAmount}
CalculatedMember.Formula: [Measures].[Extended Amount Currency NATLOECD or INTERNET] - [Measures].[Received Amount Currency NATLOECD or INTERNET]

CalculatedMember.name: Commitments Amount Currency NATLOECD or INTERNET
CalculatedMember.caption: %{commitmentsAmount}
CalculatedMember.Formula: IIF([Measures].[Commitments Amount Currency NATLOECD] > 0, [Measures].[Commitments Amount Currency NATLOECD], [Measures].[Commitments Amount Currency INTERNET])

CalculatedMember.name: Interest Received Amount Currency NATLOECD or INTERNET
CalculatedMember.caption: %{interestReceivedAmount}
CalculatedMember.Formula: IIF([Measures].[Interest Received Amount Currency NATLOECD] > 0, [Measures].[Interest Received Amount Currency NATLOECD], [Measures].[Interest Received Amount Currency INTERNET])

CalculatedMember.name: Expert Commitments Amount Currency NATLOECD or INTERNET
CalculatedMember.caption: %{expertCommitmentsAmount}
CalculatedMember.Formula: IIF([Measures].[Expert Commitments Currency NATLOECD] > 0, [Measures].[Expert Commitments Currency NATLOECD], [Measures].[Expert Commitments Currency INTERNET])

CalculatedMember.name: Expert Extended Amount Currency NATLOECD or INTERNET
CalculatedMember.caption: %{expertExtendedAmount}
CalculatedMember.Formula: IIF([Measures].[Expert Extended Currency NATLOECD] > 0, [Measures].[Expert Extended Currency NATLOECD], [Measures].[Expert Extended Currency INTERNET])

CalculatedMember.name: Budget/MTEF Disb Current Year NATLOECD or INTERNET
CalculatedMember.caption: %{budgetMTEFDisbCurrentYear}
CalculatedMember.Formula: IIF([Measures].[Budget/MTEF Disb Current Year NATLOECD] > 0, [Measures].[Budget/MTEF Disb Current Year NATLOECD], [Measures].[Budget/MTEF Disb Current Year INTERNET])

CalculatedMember.name: Budget/MTEF Disb Year 1 NATLOECD or INTERNET
CalculatedMember.caption: %{budgetMTEFDisbYear1}
CalculatedMember.Formula: IIF([Measures].[Budget/MTEF Disb Year 1 NATLOECD] > 0, [Measures].[Budget/MTEF Disb Year 1 NATLOECD], [Measures].[Budget/MTEF Disb Year 1 INTERNET])

CalculatedMember.name: Budget/MTEF Disb Year 2 NATLOECD or INTERNET
CalculatedMember.caption: %{budgetMTEFDisbYear2}
CalculatedMember.Formula: IIF([Measures].[Budget/MTEF Disb Year 2 NATLOECD] > 0, [Measures].[Budget/MTEF Disb Year 2 NATLOECD], [Measures].[Budget/MTEF Disb Year 2 INTERNET])

CalculatedMember.name: Budget/MTEF Disb Year 3 NATLOECD or INTERNET
CalculatedMember.caption: %{budgetMTEFDisbYear3}
CalculatedMember.Formula: IIF([Measures].[Budget/MTEF Disb Year 3 NATLOECD] > 0, [Measures].[Budget/MTEF Disb Year 3 NATLOECD], [Measures].[Budget/MTEF Disb Year 3 INTERNET])

CalculatedMember.name: Budget/MTEF Disb Year 4 NATLOECD or INTERNET
CalculatedMember.caption: %{budgetMTEFDisbYear4}
CalculatedMember.Formula: IIF([Measures].[Budget/MTEF Disb Year 4 NATLOECD] > 0, [Measures].[Budget/MTEF Disb Year 4 NATLOECD], [Measures].[Budget/MTEF Disb Year 4 INTERNET])

CalculatedMember.name: Tied Amount NATLOECD or INTERNET
CalculatedMember.caption: %{tiedAmount}
CalculatedMember.Formula: IIF([Measures].[Tied Amount NATLOECD] > 0, [Measures].[Tied Amount NATLOECD], [Measures].[Tied Amount INTERNET])

CalculatedMember.caption: %{untiedAmount}
CalculatedMember.Formula: IIF([Measures].[Untied Amount NATLOECD] > 0, [Measures].[Untied Amount NATLOECD], [Measures].[Untied Amount INTERNET])

CalculatedMember.name: Partially Untied NATLOECD or INTERNET
CalculatedMember.caption: %{partiallyUntiedAmount}
CalculatedMember.Formula: IIF([Measures].[Partially Untied NATLOECD] > 0, [Measures].[Partially Untied NATLOECD], [Measures].[Partially Untied INTERNET])

CalculatedMember.name: Grants
CalculatedMember.Formula: SUM({[Type of Finance].[TYPE_OF_FINANCE##100],[Type of Finance].[TYPE_OF_FINANCE##110],[Type of Finance].[TYPE_OF_FINANCE##111]})

CalculatedMember.name: Non Grants
CalculatedMember.Formula: SUM({[Type of Finance].[TYPE_OF_FINANCE##400], [Type of Finance].[TYPE_OF_FINANCE##410], [Type of Finance].[TYPE_OF_FINANCE##411],[Type of Finance].[TYPE_OF_FINANCE##412],[Type of Finance].[TYPE_OF_FINANCE##413],[Type of Finance].[TYPE_OF_FINANCE##414],[Type of Finance].[TYPE_OF_FINANCE##450],[Type of Finance].[TYPE_OF_FINANCE##451],[Type of Finance].[TYPE_OF_FINANCE##452],[Type of Finance].[TYPE_OF_FINANCE##453],[Type of Finance].[TYPE_OF_FINANCE##500],[Type of Finance].[TYPE_OF_FINANCE##510],[Type of Finance].[TYPE_OF_FINANCE##511],[Type of Finance].[TYPE_OF_FINANCE##512],[Type of Finance].[TYPE_OF_FINANCE##600],[Type of Finance].[TYPE_OF_FINANCE##610],[Type of Finance].[TYPE_OF_FINANCE##611],[Type of Finance].[TYPE_OF_FINANCE##612],[Type of Finance].[TYPE_OF_FINANCE##613],[Type of Finance].[TYPE_OF_FINANCE##614],[Type of Finance].[TYPE_OF_FINANCE##615],[Type of Finance].[TYPE_OF_FINANCE##616],[Type of Finance].[TYPE_OF_FINANCE##617],[Type of Finance].[TYPE_OF_FINANCE##618],[Type of Finance].[TYPE_OF_FINANCE##620],[Type of Finance].[TYPE_OF_FINANCE##621],[Type of Finance].[TYPE_OF_FINANCE##622],[Type of Finance].[TYPE_OF_FINANCE##623],[Type of Finance].[TYPE_OF_FINANCE##624],[Type of Finance].[TYPE_OF_FINANCE##625],[Type of Finance].[TYPE_OF_FINANCE##626],[Type of Finance].[TYPE_OF_FINANCE##627],[Type of Finance].[TYPE_OF_FINANCE##630],[Type of Finance].[TYPE_OF_FINANCE##631],[Type of Finance].[TYPE_OF_FINANCE##632],[Type of Finance].[TYPE_OF_FINANCE##700],[Type of Finance].[TYPE_OF_FINANCE##710],[Type of Finance].[TYPE_OF_FINANCE##711],[Type of Finance].[TYPE_OF_FINANCE##800],[Type of Finance].[TYPE_OF_FINANCE##810],[Type of Finance].[TYPE_OF_FINANCE##811],[Type of Finance].[TYPE_OF_FINANCE##900],[Type of Finance].[TYPE_OF_FINANCE##910],[Type of Finance].[TYPE_OF_FINANCE##911],[Type of Finance].[TYPE_OF_FINANCE##912]})
